files.patch:
@@ -72,1 +72,1 @@
-        NAME_MACRO := rename_stripped \
+        NAME_MACRO := rename_stripped, \
@@ -92,1 +92,1 @@
-        NAME_MACRO := rename_stripped \
+        NAME_MACRO := rename_stripped, \

@@ -285,30 +285,0 @@
-# In case of Windows and --with-external-symbols-in-bundles=public:
-# Copy *.stripped.pdb files to images, renamed to *.pdb.
-ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, windows)+$(SHIP_DEBUG_SYMBOLS), true+public)
-  rename_stripped = $(patsubst %.stripped.pdb,%.pdb,$1)
-
-  SetupCopyStrippedDebuginfo = \
-      $(foreach m, $(ALL_$1_MODULES), \
-        $(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_$1_LIBS_DEBUGINFO_$m, \
-            SRC := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_libs/$m, \
-            DEST := $($1_IMAGE_DIR)/$(LIBS_TARGET_SUBDIR), \
-            FILES := $(filter %.stripped.pdb, \
-                $(call FindDebuginfoFiles,$(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_libs/$m)), \
-            NAME_MACRO := rename_stripped \
-        )) \
-        $(eval $1_TARGETS += $$(COPY_$1_LIBS_DEBUGINFO_$m)) \
-        $(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_$1_CMDS_DEBUGINFO_$m, \
-            SRC := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_cmds/$m, \
-            DEST := $($1_IMAGE_DIR)/$(CMDS_TARGET_SUBDIR), \
-            FILES := $(filter %.stripped.pdb, \
-                $(call FindDebuginfoFiles,$(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_cmds/$m)), \
-            NAME_MACRO := rename_stripped \
-        )) \
-        $(eval $1_TARGETS += $$(COPY_$1_CMDS_DEBUGINFO_$m)) \
-      )
-
-  # No space before argument to avoid having to put $(strip ) everywhere in implementation above.
-  $(call SetupCopyStrippedDebuginfo,JDK)
-  $(call SetupCopyStrippedDebuginfo,JRE)
-endif
-
@@ -319,3 +289,3 @@
-      $(eval DBGFILES := $(call FindDebuginfoFiles, $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_libs/$m)) \
-      $(eval DBGFILES := $(if $(filter true+public,$(call isTargetOs,windows)+$(SHIP_DEBUG_SYMBOLS)), \
-        $(filter-out %.stripped.pdb,$(DBGFILES)),$(DBGFILES)) \
+      $(eval dbgfiles := $(call FindDebuginfoFiles, $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_libs/$m)) \
+      $(eval dbgfiles := $(if $(filter true+public,$(call isTargetOs,windows)+$(SHIP_DEBUG_SYMBOLS)), \
+        $(filter-out %.stripped.pdb,$(dbgfiles)),$(dbgfiles)) \
@@ -326,1 +296,1 @@
-          FILES := $(DBGFILES), \
+          FILES := $(dbgfiles), \
@@ -329,3 +299,3 @@
-      $(eval DBGFILES := $(call FindDebuginfoFiles, $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_cmds/$m)) \
-      $(eval DBGFILES := $(if $(filter true+public,$(call isTargetOs,windows)+$(SHIP_DEBUG_SYMBOLS)), \
-        $(filter-out %.stripped.pdb,$(DBGFILES)),$(DBGFILES)) \
+      $(eval dbgfiles := $(call FindDebuginfoFiles, $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_cmds/$m)) \
+      $(eval dbgfiles := $(if $(filter true+public,$(call isTargetOs,windows)+$(SHIP_DEBUG_SYMBOLS)), \
+        $(filter-out %.stripped.pdb,$(dbgfiles)),$(dbgfiles)) \
@@ -336,1 +306,1 @@
-          FILES := $(DBGFILES), \
+          FILES := $(dbgfiles), \
